api_list.name: updateUser
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nbzor-homework-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nbzor-homework-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
